section.p: A person or business that employs one or more people, especially for wages or salary.

ol.li:

A categorization of the type of activity in which an organization is engaged. It is anticipated that the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) would be used here.

Contains exactly one [1..1] organization, where its type is Organization
The organization playing the role of employer.
